text:
October 15, 1956
Mr. Thomas B. Maclin, Jr.
Director, Radio-Television
Mississippi Southern College
Station A, Box 52
Hattiesburg, Mississippi
Dear Mr. Maclin:
Reference is made to your letter of October 11, addressed to
Mr. Hill. Mr. Hill is on a trip out of town and will not be
back in the office until after October 22. Your letter will
be called to his attention upon his return and I'm sure you
will hear from him shortly thereafter.
However, I'd like to point out that wired-wireless stations
are not eligible for Active membership in the NAEB. I'm sure
Mr. Hill will explain this when he writes and will describe
how Mississippi Southern College might be eligible for either
Associate or Affiliate membership.
Sincerely,
Mary F. Bryner (Mrs.)
Secretary
